response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $800,000 by both myself and you. This exceptional item holds immense significance and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. Considering its unparalleled quality and value, I am extending to you a special offer to purchase it at a price that reflects its true worth. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $750,000. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to secure this masterpiece at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 750000}
